QuestData.Title: Capturing a Clefthoof
QuestData.Description: Way up north in the frozen peaks of Frostfire Ridge, you'll find the wooly clefthoof.$B$BThey're sturdy, for sure, and fierce when you corner them. Don't expect them to be tamed without a fight.$B$BHere's a lasso, see if you can't manage to tame one before it tugs the rope out of your hands.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Clefthoof Lasso on a Young Icehoof and follow it until it is tamed.
